DOC.brief_summary: Analysis of vitreous proteins in patients undergoing pars plana vitrectomy for proliferative diabetic retinopathy
DOC.brief_title: Vitrous Analysis in Proliferative Diabetic Retinopathy
DOC.detailed_description: To analyse and compare vitreous proteins in patients undergoing pars plana vitrectomy for proliferative diabetic retinopathy.
DOC.criteria: proliferative diabetic retinopathy with vitreous hemorrhage vitreous hemorrhage of other cause than proliferative diabetic retinopathy previous vitrectomy
